name: Infrastructure Type
description: High level category for infrastuture e.g. transport/education/healthcare

name: Intervention Class
description: What type of intervention is it? New construction or upgrade

name: Geometry Type
description: Type of geometry that represents the intervention

name: Include
description: Should the intervention be shown in the UI

name: Interface Type
description: Should the intervention be shown in the basic UI or only in the advanced UI

name: User entered parameters
description: What additional parmeters must be entered by the user

name: Elevation unit
description: Units forr user entered elevations (e.g. metres)
